entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle early this morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
